objetivo: The course aims to train professionals to develop projects, size and specify the materials and systems to be used, as well as execute civil construction works.
During the course, the student will receive a solid education in the areas of computing and electronics.
The course aims to utilize knowledge from the life sciences for the production of products, services, and processes developed by living organisms, within a multidisciplinary field of knowledge.
The course aims to provide students with a solid and general education so that they can work in the planning, design, development and implementation of electro-electronic systems.

The course aims to train mathematics teachers for basic education, providing them with a solid scientific, pedagogical, humanistic, and cultural foundation, and enabling them to pursue continuing education.

The course trains professionals to work in quality control of chemical processes and products, in chemical, physicochemical, and chemical-biological analyses, product and process standardization, and also in research and development of new technologies.
The course aims to train professionals to work in the areas of web development, computer network administration and design, and internet services and systems administration.

nome: Coming soon: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
objetivo: A course approved for the Toledo Campus, scheduled to begin in 2027, focused on technology and innovation.
